content: {"name": "Bronx Bethany Community Corporation Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Scheduling an appointment through PLENTIFUL app will give fast track (priority) since there are 2 lines.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.bbccnyc.com/the-food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "964 East 227th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "East Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10466", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8865032, "longitude": -73.85184799999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 697-9672", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on the 5th Wednesday and Thursday of the month."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
